website_summaries.verdict: A trusted brand in train sets delivers a holiday favorite. If you want hours of dependable fun, season after season, this is the train for you.
pros: The most complete train set on the market
The manufacturer has thought of every detail, including synchronized smoke bellowing with the engine's puff

customer_reviews.title: True to Lionel Quality and expectations!
customer_reviews.text: My first Lionel train in a long time, I am 63 and had to have this Polar Express to share with my granddaughters. They range from 6 weeks to 7 years. Each Christmas we watch the movie and now can play with the train! It’s very well made and was easy to hook up and connect via BLuetooth to my iPhone. Of course after I purchased it, Amazon had a lower price for Cyber Monday and Amazon made good on the price. It was well packaged and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect. Functions as it’s supposed to and very fun to watch.
customer_reviews.author: Ric G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Train
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this train....beautiful engine...love the light up cars...he was so excited on Xmas morning
customer_reviews.author: kbooth

customer_reviews.title: Impeccable Lionel Quality and So Much Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an early Christmas surprise for my almost 5 year old son and he loves it more than I thought he would! It has great detail and is a true Lionel train, the weight of the train alone proves the unmatched build quality. At full speed I was worried the train might crash but it surprisingly stayed on the track without issue. This may seem expensive but for a being a true Lionel train it is worth every penny. Don’t hesitate and just go for it on this one you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Merando

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great weighty train with good details. The remote is nice and connect quick n easy. The tracks are pretty tough to connect. I'm sure it will get better over time but out of the box pretty tough to fully connect. I was hoping for more quotes and sounds from the movie but not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: imports597

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a replacement, that one's worse!!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED: I don't think Amazon is an authorized dealer, so buyer beware! I'm boxing up the SECOND one (Amazons replacement for the one mentioned below) to send it back. The sound issue was worse on the 2nd than on the first one! See below: CHRISTMAS MORNING: No sound right out of the box on Christmas morning. INCREDIBLE disappointment for my son who has been watching the movie for a month and was looking forward to hearing the train.
customer_reviews.author: Vitesse

customer_reviews.title: Only puffed and chuffed a few minutes
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced junk. Very disappointed! It worked great about 5 or 6 times around the track. Puffed smoke and made the chuff chuff sound then it just quit both. It still runs and lights up but light on engine is so dim you can hard see it in the dark.. Also as others have stated, the voice sounds get stuck and keeps repeating the same thing over and over. I expected a set to last for years but this thing is wearing out after a few minutes. I emailed the company but since they clearly do not care to answer emails, I filed a return request with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Daughtrey

customer_reviews.title: The Polar Express Train Runs Like A Charm!
customer_reviews.text: I grew up playing with old-fashioned Lionel trains. They had a "Transformer", connected to the metal tracks with "Wires". Bluetooth is something that is completely NEW to me. I purchased this train set to learn about "Wireless" control of the train. I had to purchase this train set, return it, and get a replacement train set. While having to make a return was rather inconvenient, I found that Amazon.com has an easy, smooth return process. My replacement train set works great! For the price, which is lower than what Lionel charges on it's website, I'm glad that I made my purchase on Amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: ASPIEMAN

customer_reviews.title: Engine dead
customer_reviews.text: Just got delivery today. I was impressed with all the reviews and was looking forward to a nice train set under the tree this year. After unboxing everthing and laying all the tracks under the tree. Placing the engine car on the track with the tender, sounds were great but it never moved. installed app on my phone and the app is great. Only problem is the engine does not work! Now the fun starts, repack all the crap and send it back. Made in China, what should any one expect.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a train set to put around the Christmas tree, this is the one to get. Much much better quality that the Disney Lionel train set. I hadn’t to return that one. I really wanted to like the Disney set, especially because my daughter loves Mickey, but the quality was horrible. The polar express is excellent quality. It also has Bluetooth, which the Disney one didn’t. Everything works as described. Made me love Lionel trains again. Would highly recommend for Xmas tree.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Pernas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Train
customer_reviews.text: Love this train. Present for my wife, and she set it up with her Christmas Village. Only thing is to get the chuff sound and smoke to turn on or off, we have to manually switch them turn the remote off wait for the beeps, then turn it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Jedidiah

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: The train stopped working after a few weeks. There are sections of the track that are now bad and the train will not make contact so it stops. I had extra track and replaced some pieces. The train runs o.k. now. I am surprised that the track went bad so soon.
customer_reviews.author: davel

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality replica of the PE!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the grandkids at Christmas because they absolutely loved the movie. This is a high quality real Lionel train set that worked perfectly out of the box. The kids were mesmerized by the smoke from the locomotive and the fantastic ly real sound effects. Packaging was superb and just perfect to store the set until next Christmas. The ONLY issue I had (and its a small one) was trying to install the curved handrail on the rear of the last car. Not essential for operation, it just looks cool. I haven’t yet figured out the trick.
customer_reviews.author: CKohlman

customer_reviews.title: Test the Locomotive
customer_reviews.text: Well the locomotive is completely silent and im un happy so ive got more than 5 locomotives and even the on and off switch doesnt make a difference so now im stuck with a broken silent running locomotive i no longer have the box
customer_reviews.author: blacksheep

customer_reviews.title: Very detailed train with great sounds and smoke
customer_reviews.text: The shipping box was very strong, with no apparent damage. The inside retail box was also perfect. It's obvious that Lionel packs their train sets very well. The set I received was the latest Lionel offering in the Polar Express line. The train is beautifully crafted, the remote works perfectly and the sounds programmed in are very accurate and add to the experience. Finally, the price ($249.95) was very reasonable. Of course, the train ran perfectly when I set it up today to test it. I plan on purchasing additional track to make a more exciting layout that will still fit under our Christmas Tree. Thank you Nassau Hobby Center for providing a great buying experience.
customer_reviews.author: lfroboz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Model Train
customer_reviews.text: Train runs very smooth. No problems. Sounds great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: This train didn’t work at all for us. My son waited for months to get a Polar Express train for Christmas. It was his only gift (due to the price). We set it up exactly as the instructions said and it doesn’t run. The lights turn on but there is no sound. It doesn’t connect to the remote or the app. The poor kid has been crying all Christmas morning. We’ve been watching troubleshooting videos and searching all the forums for a possible fix. Nothing is working. Gonna send it back.
customer_reviews.author: MCalhoun7

customer_reviews.title: product failed on all sound effects
customer_reviews.text: All the sound effects on this train set stopped working with in 2 weeks , The only thing that worked on the remote control was the speed , and the engine still wafted smoke, but the smoke puffing unit stopped working, actually the puffer was the first thing to stop working , the other sounds started to work on and off after that , then all stopped working all together , I called Lionel and their repair shop is shut down do to the virus , so no warranty was able to obtain . Amazon was good enough to allow me a full refund after I returned the Polar express Lionel train set ,
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Quality train with character!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has wanted a quality train set for years to set out during the holidays. He was so pleased when this surprise was delivered today and immediately examined each piece (I am so pleased with the quality) so he could get it set up. Only one little issue, the rail that goes on the last car (where people would stand on the platform and wave:) won't stay on so I think we will need to glue on. I see this train set becoming part of our family holiday memories.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: What a neat train set!  Its exactly what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: What a neat train set! Completely brand new and shipped in its original packing box, as well as the set wrapped and sealed in plastic. This is a great deal for this set. You could not ask for a better item and I purchased it on Saturday and it arrived Monday, you cannot ask for faster shipping. I am thoroughly pleased! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff DeFord

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old grandson for his first O gauge set. He has always loved trains. Loving the Polar Express came later. We built a table with folding legs and extra track to make a bigger loop. The table is 4 x 8 feet. The train with more tract will fill the table.Th4 people to put on the train. The passenger cars are lighted and look cool with the lights off. This set will be easy to add scenery to make it appear like a winter scene. It will bring joy to him for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: teach408632

customer_reviews.title: Waiting For engine to return
customer_reviews.text: Was not happy. Pieces were broken and the engine didn’t run. Had to send it in to Lionel. Hope I get it back before Christmas but it doesn’t look good. :(. Update Lionel repair center return my engine on December 24. Was able to set up new train for an enjoyment on Christmas day. Thank you Lionel. It looks so great. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jpmaes

customer_reviews.title: Great trainset with authentication construction
customer_reviews.text: I really like this trainset. The iron cast engine is solid and the little attention to details like passengers in the carriages is great. I wish the smoke was fuller and bellowed more but understandably that would make for a very smokey room. Also the little railing for the last carriage kept falling off but it’s a small issue. The app works great and I was very happy with a trainset I’ve always wanted to get.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Dalton

customer_reviews.title: once the cars are aligned properly it's very nice.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for my husband and son to play together. Definitely not a children's toy to be used alone by small children. My 4 year old loves to play with Daddy. The engine is very heavy. My complaint is that even as an adult, it's very difficult to align all the cars correctly on the track. We spent about $300 on this item and I wish it worked effortlessly for the expense. However, once the cars are aligned properly it's very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof5

customer_reviews.title: Do these ever work?
customer_reviews.text: I know I’m just a voice to whom Lionel will never respond, but am I the only one having incredibly bad luck with these new LionChief starter sets? So far, I have acquired both the Polar Express and Hogswart O gauge trains and after less than six months of use, neither engine will “chuff” anymore, and the Hogswart engine will no longer respond to horn or bell commands from the remote (hand-held controller or iPad app). Am I expecting too much from these cheap China imports?
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bifulco

customer_reviews.title: Even Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: This train was a Christmas gift for my husband. It was amazing. When he opened it, he said he felt the same excitement that he used to feel when he opened great gifts as a kid. Given the fact that he is over 50, the mission was accomplished. The quality of parts is top-notch with a nice heaviness to the train cars. The track fits together nicely and the train travels smoothly even at higher speeds. We look forward to adding to this Polar Express collection!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Problem
customer_reviews.text: Trains chugging sound keeps cutting out two weeks old. Called Lionel 3 times on hold every time for about 8 to 10 minutes then a recording to leave name and call back number. Did this first call then second call I didn’t bother leaving name and number as that was already done and they had not responded to that call yet. Next day third call same hold time then recording BUT recording then said mailbox is full and hung up. Message could not be left.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Bear

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money! My son and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so easy to run my 3 year old can do it. But I also got the disappearing hobo car, another Madison car and the aquarium car... I also got him 2 bridges ( 1 trestle and 1 covered) and several other accessories. He loves it. I put a mark on the remote to where it likes to run the best at and also so my son knows not to go faster than that. It’s running on a very big tack but if you go too fast around corners the rubber tires will come off... very fun and makes lots of sounds and announcements from the movie!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Item broke down within 10 days
customer_reviews.text: We bought this 2 weeks back- while it worked, we loved it. Then it suddenly stopped working 2 days before Christmas ! Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: gradstudent

customer_reviews.title: Made for a magical Christmas
customer_reviews.text: We love this train! I will note that the first train that was sent to us had some issues-- we kept having to put a piece back on the engine. But the replacement train worked WONDERFULLY. We had the replacement within 3 days of shipping the defective train back and thoroughly enjoyed it through the Christmas season. We're already shopping for another train to use year-round.
customer_reviews.author: Alycia r

customer_reviews.title: Made my sons day, we couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.text: This train is amazing, my 4 year old son absolutely loves it. Such excellent quality and details were put into this train. We love the smoke rings and all the lights and sounds. The remote is really easy to control and my son got the hang of it pretty quick! We love getting it out and playing with it over and over again throughout the year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed what in set
customer_reviews.text: It is downright embarrassing the small amount of track they include with this set. Hard to get cars on track with small oval turns again what is included. If you buy set you need to add more track to make at all enjoyable and then they charge alot for additional pcs. This is only way to know your total cost to have any kind of good experience. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tommy P

customer_reviews.title: Just Like When I Was A Kid
customer_reviews.text: This product took me back to when I was 10 years old and my folks bought an O scale set for Christmas. They ran it around the Christmas tree. That's what I did. Getting it aligned on the track was a bit trickier than my first set, but it runs great. It is very solidly built and has some great lighting features. A friend came over for Christmas dinner and he was reminded of the set he got for Christmas. It brought back some very good memories.
customer_reviews.author: Sunset Sam

customer_reviews.title: Make Christmas morning every morning
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for son as Christmas present. He loves the movie, watches it year round. Set was well packaged. Engine and cars are well made, and easy for small hands to get on the track. Track base is sturdy, though going to need an adult to put together. Tight fit on the tracks which is great, but means need some strength to push together.
customer_reviews.author: Russel A. Dove

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, attention to details
customer_reviews.text: This train is very detailed and very well made! I bought it for a Christmas gift 2018. It has not been put together yet, however I’ve checked it out. My twin 4 yr old grandsons who are train fanatics will be riding the real Polar Express this year and this will be a perfect reminder of Christmas at Grammys!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kenneth Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Lionel product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a Lionel. I secured track to board. I have modeled in “N”, “HO” And now Lionel. This will be for Christmas. Awesome sound and smoke. Remote control makes it so easy. Good job Lionel. PS I added a few 10 inch sections of track. Everyone loves the train under the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Sarge71467

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandkids, 5 & 11, for Christmas. I almost went with the cheaper battery operated one and so glad that I didn't. It is holding up great under them and is a very well built product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Smoke maker doesn't work, and there is no warranty repair available.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice train set and it works well. But the smoke unit on mine did not work, so I tried to contact the company. I called and left a message, and I sent them an email through their website. I never got any response from Lionel. I never got any reply at all, so it looks like I'll have to pay to have the repair done out of my own pocket, which is going to cost around $75 minimum, even though it never worked at all and is still under warranty. If the train doesn't work, there is ZERO warranty support.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Quaid

customer_reviews.title: What a joke!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this train set for my son who was SUPER excited and waited all day for it to arrive, only for it to get here, unbox everything, set it up and find out he cannot play with it because it came with the wrong track pieces to support the DC power supply it came with. I now have a crying child and a train set that cost a small fortune that cannot be used. Be aware if you purchase this, it might not come properly packaged from factory with the correct pieces!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DANA J.

customer_reviews.title: Great lionel set compared to the old days.
customer_reviews.text: The track is very nice and the engine is incredible compared to what I grew up with. If your kids like the movie or if you want a train for around the Christmas tree this is a very nice option. We had to add four more straight track pieces to get around our tree skirt.
customer_reviews.author: Stupid People are Annoying

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set or Christmas train!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter set or for someone looking to add the Lionel addition to their Christmas! I have been a Lionel collector for 30 years now and this is Chinese built but decent quality and detail. I bought this specifically for our Christmas tree and it’s perfect! I would recommend buying another couple of pieces of straight track (this set does come with 4 pieces) and expanding it some to make it more enjoyable! Wouldn’t hesitate to buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super starter set or adder to existing trains
customer_reviews.text: Works well, like the Bluetooth. I wish you could change the voice sounds, I would prefer a non movie vocabulary and more normal train sounds. My grandkids love it.
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Not high-end quality, but good for the price
customer_reviews.text: We are fairly new to model trains, but when I opened the box I was a little disappointed by the quality, But then I remembered the price and what other trains costs and I got over it. My son loves it. No complaints from him at all. I suspect with heavy play, it will show wear and tear pretty easily. But - and this is the most important part - I can let him play with it without worrying he is tearing up a high dollar locomotive/cars.
customer_reviews.author: Amos McLean

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 1 month and no response from company
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed with this purchase. After reading so many reviews, this was the one we chose for my 8 year-old son for Christmas. He was overjoyed. It was his big gift. And then, it broke within 5 weeks and there is no response from the company, and I am unable to return it. I am not one to write reviews, positive or negative generally, but I had to voice my opinion here since we are out $275 and have a very disappointed son:(.
customer_reviews.author: Easy Real Food

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this train! Was scared to order because deliver date but it ended up arriving quicker than expected! The smoke feature is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Benavides

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work! No customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Train worked for a day. Then completely stopped. The lights and sounds will work but it won’t move. Tried multiple times to contact Lionel, no response. Was advised by local trains experts that Lionel has crappy service and to just return it. So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Sheepsrkool

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 24 hours before needing service
customer_reviews.text: The operation of the locomotive is great and fun. The remote, bluetooth, smoke all worked great and my kids had a blast playing with it. However, the locomotive broke within 24 hours of gentile use. I am not impressed. I bought this train on the reputation and trust that Lionel represents. I always associated Lionel with quality so I am disappointed with his product.
customer_reviews.author: ken the crazy Ohioan

customer_reviews.title: Ruined Christmas Eve! Train track bent and unusable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely livid!!! I purchased this train set with the intentoin to open and set up Christmas Eve. Instead of the wonder and excitement of building a track, we were astonished at the revelation of piece after piece of bent up train track that would never connect or function as intended. My husband who had always wanted a train for our Christmas tree was left thanking me for the thought, but heartbroken that this set would not be up and running for our kids in the morning. There is absolutely no way your seller was not aware they were sending a defective track. I am requesting a refund as I will not get this night back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Train Set!
customer_reviews.text: Train came and was easy to pull out of the box. Track went together very easy. I followed the set up as described in the manual and I had the train up and running in 20 minutes. Everything worked as it should. I am amazed how great a train set this was for the price. I have already started looking at other items I can buy for the train set. Total thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVED his early Christmas gift, the dog is still undecided. The set is an A+, easy to assemble and Tom Hanks voice with several sayings from the movie is amazing! I did purchase the extra track pack so when we have a larger tree it will easily fit. Looking forward to many years of making memories with our kids and way in the future grandchildren. That is if we can get the remote away from my husband!
customer_reviews.author: liz123465

customer_reviews.title: Lionel Trains a tradition
customer_reviews.text: The Polar Express exceeded my expectations. We have a perfectly operating train around the base of the Christmas tree. All functions from the sound to train control are excellent. Track looks great and the train operates perfect.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dan

customer_reviews.title: Solid train for $260
customer_reviews.text: Had originally purchased this set and the cheaper "ready to play" set for my 4 year old. This set was the one we decided to keep. This set feels much more solid. The bluetooth app is a great feature that allows you to set a max speed and volume control. I can let my toddler use the app and not worry about it flying off the track. The rear observation car does have a cheap flimsy railing which arrived partly cracked. Called lionel and they shipped a replacement no questions asked. Nice train!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Becoming a tradition
customer_reviews.text: 2nd year of use. Works great. My son loves the smoke. It has become an event for me and him to assemble the train after mom and daughter are done decorating the tree. Can be control via app which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: It had some defects
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box there were 3 problems - a missing part, a broken part, and one that didn't fit right. Amazon made it right. I understand Lionel's need to hold down the cost of this item. But, the quality is not up to Lionel's usual standards. Still, the set offers a lot of value for the money. The defective items were disappointing; but, it was all corrected.
customer_reviews.author: Glen S

customer_reviews.title: Present
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it, I love it and so does my son. Not the set we grew up with but it still blows smoke, has a whistle and some extras that were not invented when we were kids. And yes, the locomotive is as heavy as you remember.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie L.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic train
customer_reviews.text: Brought back my childhood! Me being 75 years old I wanted to setup the train for Christmas! It is a very good product! A little different from my childhood but about the, they made differently back my day.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has been a train fanatic for years and the Polar Express was the perfect birthday gift. The sound and smoke effects are realistic and add a lot of fun to operating the set. It was his favorite gift.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Missing pieces and track broken. Set was missing 2 figures and a set of track did not work.z
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L Dow

customer_reviews.title: Great around-the-tree train set
customer_reviews.text: I love this train set. It ran great as soon as I set up the track. Some minor quibbles... 1. No way to turn the power off with unplugging it; 2. The Android app controls all the functions and even when it's not linked, the handheld remote cant change some of them; 3. The back porch on the observation car does, as some other reviews said, need to be super glued into place or it falls off. But overall, a great train with fun sound and wireless control. The small movie character action figures are nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Orr

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Lionel!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Lionel product what more needs to be said. The name Lionel has come to mean top of the line in model trains. I have the Lionel Polar Express and bought this for my son for Christmas to go under the tree at his house so glad we did!
customer_reviews.author: David Kathy Carr

customer_reviews.title: LIONEL THE POLAR EXPRESS ELECTRIC O GAUGE TRAIN SET AND REMOTE !!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Set ...... Can't wait until Christmas when my Grandchildren see this all set up under the tree.... Got it for a fantastic deal from Amazon Warehouse.....
customer_reviews.author: E. McClafferty

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Always done model trains, but this was my first Lionel and I was not disappointed! Same Lionel quality I always heard about. The locomotive sounds and Tom Hanks announcements really bring you back to the movie! And the bluetooth phone app makes it a fun experience. The grandkids laid on the floor and loved watching it. Great train set and tempting to expand it...but I will refrain.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but.....the tracks!
customer_reviews.text: Tracks are hard to connect. Most of the time, it turned off by itself, you have to place the train on tracks really good. I wish you can adjust the volume. Other than, I’m happy with my purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Eloisa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing train!
customer_reviews.text: I like how the seller took really good care of it it was listed as a collectors item and it came as a collectors item this is not a toy folks this is the real deal it was always my dream to have a real train and I finally got it under 300 dollars thank you WE IL for selling it to me!
customer_reviews.author: kyle smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Train Set!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not disappointed in buying this train set. Next year ,I will add some accessories to my train. All I have this year is the train going around in a circle around the bottom of our Christmas tree. I'm 70 years old and wanted the nostalgia of the train. There are many accessories including track, freight cars, houses, crossing gates and houses plus stations.
customer_reviews.author: Edward S.

customer_reviews.title: Treasured Christmas toy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my Christmas collection and my nephew loved it. Goes great with the Lionel hot chocolate scented smoke fluid.
customer_reviews.author: priscilla watson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I love my new train set. The quality is amazing! This will be the new holiday tradition for my family. My 2 year old grandson loves it so when we pull it out next Christmas I can't wait to see the look on his face. The best part was the app that makes your phone a remote. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Zanotti

customer_reviews.title: Awesome train. 5 yr old son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome train. 5 yr old son loves it. Surprisingly he’s been very gentle with it but it’s a great set. He loves watching it move and he blasts the horn and bell constantly. Annoying but fun too
customer_reviews.author: Msp77

customer_reviews.title: Great train
customer_reviews.text: Excellent train. Works great and was the perfect size for my toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Spent a lot of time deciding if we were going to spend this much on a train for under the tree. Since we've had it the kids have had so much fun...totally worth it. Tracks are nice and sturdy along with every other piece feeling well made. Took roughly 15 minutes to get setup after getting everything out of the box. Yes it does have smoke coming out of the stack.
customer_reviews.author: clint

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The engine arrived with the wires that connect to the tender ripped out of base. Have returned, but a replacement is now $30 more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Moon Kupka

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Connecting the track pieces to each other tightly does need a pliers to squeeze the sections together. very pleasant to watch chugging around the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J. Zervoudakis

customer_reviews.title: Cool train.  Great quality.  Just watch for used set.
customer_reviews.text: Train looks and sounds great. No complaints with quality. However, be very careful as the first set I got even though it was sealed with Lionel factory tape was very clearly a used set. Luckily I was able to get a fully exchanged set.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Great Train.
customer_reviews.text: Great train, very pleased. Wish it wouldnt keep beeping, when powered on but in park. Also think the Hobo car should be included.
customer_reviews.author: BrianB

customer_reviews.title: no power pack
customer_reviews.text: How extremely disappointed I was to open a train track on Christmas morning only to find out I cant play with my son because it didn't come with a power pack???? How can you sell a train set with no power????? Big mistake buying this Thanks for ruining a Christmas for a special little boy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Polar Express Train
customer_reviews.text: Heavy trains. Beautiful. Our two year old mastered the remote in a few minutes. Alas, it is really not a toy that should be left out for routine play. But what a magical Christmas morning it made for our grandson. He is obsessed with trains and this one fascinated him to the point of not playing with anything else Christmas morning. We will add more track next year. Great gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary McMullen

customer_reviews.title: I love the train though.
customer_reviews.text: Tracks very very hard to keep together, and wish it came with more straight tracks,very small for such a long train. I am a woman and do have a bit of arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but quality of the car assembly can be annoying
customer_reviews.text: The train is lovely but the flimsy unreliable car assembly is enough to spoil a holiday afternoon... after looking online I see this is a common complaint in their beginner sets. Took some homemade engineering to solve it.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley O

customer_reviews.title: Lionel still a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Almost as great as the train set that I played with when I was a kid. This train smoke system did not work well after 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: Wiz62

customer_reviews.title: Nice train with great sounds.
customer_reviews.text: Great train. Volume can be change only on phone app. Train derails often if running at 1/2 speed or higher.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good set, runs nicely
customer_reviews.text: Nice, i liked it. Everything is good. Assembly is not too hard but the engine and coaches need to be properly alligned, which can be a little tricky. Also noticed sparks from the tracks, worry that it could be a fire hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Srirang

customer_reviews.title: This train is not made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Said on Lionel website they were made in USA. The box that the train comes in says its made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Dorfman

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Lionel Train
customer_reviews.text: The train arrived before Christmas. was a gift for my son. he was excited and had it together that same evening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like in the movie!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it too late to put under our Christmas tree. It will be under the tree next year for sure only I will add a little more track. Super value!
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great train set!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality train set! My husband had no issues with set up. We ordered extra tracks.
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: Great first model train.
customer_reviews.text: Grand son love it. He was the engineer moving it around the Christmas tree.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but good
customer_reviews.text: Over all a great product. A bit pricy for plastic but still a decent buy
customer_reviews.author: Amy Estes

customer_reviews.title: Just like the Movie.
customer_reviews.text: This train is so neat, and it sounds exactly like a train, and we love the Polar Express saying. Love the little smoke rings that it makes as it comes around the tracks to. We played with it for 2 hours after we got it out of the box! So cut and so much fun, ended up purchasing reindeer and going to purchase other parts of the collection too.
customer_reviews.author: susan m harnan

customer_reviews.title: A good starter set for train models
customer_reviews.text: The train set is easy to assemble and looks very professional. One of the cars doesn’t work and got replaced by amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Love Lionel
customer_reviews.text: Well built, solid, train. Which exactly what I expected from the Lionel brand. My boys loved receiving this Christmas morning. Remote is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Stringer

customer_reviews.title: I and the Grandkids loved it. Finally got the locomotive to puff out ...
customer_reviews.text: I and the Grandkids loved it. Finally got the locomotive to puff out the smoke properly at the end. Set it up under one of out Christmas trees.
customer_reviews.author: Casper

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This train worked good for 1 day and then the sound car stopped working. No fun without sound! Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron L. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: low quality/disappointment
customer_reviews.text: after 15 days the sound effects have stopped working. for $260 i expect it to last years not weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: A great companion for the movie
customer_reviews.text: Everything fit and worked perfectly right out of the box. The locomotive is an accurate representation of the existing PM 1225 locomotive.
customer_reviews.author: Discover

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and looks!  Get the Bluetooth app!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality real metal engine, smokes great and works as is out of the box. Only complaint if I had to nitpick is that you cannot turn off power to the train without unplugging the track (under tree train makes this difficult)
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I like the authentic look and feel of the Lionel train. The train features a lot of bells and whistles, excuse my pun, that embellish the experience for all users.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Terranova

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little train
customer_reviews.text: Very well built set. The iPhone app is awesome. Paired immediately and works right out of the box. Excellent train set.
customer_reviews.author: Mark V

customer_reviews.title: Adults love it as much as kids!
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful, well-made train set - such a realistic whistle, chugging sound, lights up and blows smoke!
customer_reviews.author: Susan G.

customer_reviews.title: Is an A+++++ train we simply love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful train. Perfectly design and work properly. We love it
customer_reviews.author: Ileana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Train!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Lionel Lionchief Polar Express! I plan on putting it around my Christmas tree!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Taylor

product_meta.title: Lionel The Polar Express Electric O Gauge Model Train Set with Remote and Bluetooth Capability
product_meta.description: Size:Complete SetThe Polar Express has been capturing imaginations and hearts for over 30 years and Lionel has had the privilege to be a part of it. This year we are introducing a newly decorated and enhanced The Polar Express LionChief set equipped with our LionChief Bluetooth technology. This will give you smooth operation and better sounds all by running the Polar Express train with your smart device.
feature_bullets: Set Includes: 2-8-4 locomotive and tender, Two coach cars, Observation car, Four articulated movie characters, Eight curved O36 FasTrack track sections, one 10” straight FasTrack Plug-Expand-Play power lock-on section, one FasTrack terminal section, and two 10” straight, FasTrack sections, Wall-pack power supply, LionChief remote for locomotive, The Polar Express bell.

Locomotive Features: Electric locomotive controlled by remote or LionChief Bluetooth, Official “All aboard The Polar Express” and “Tickets Please“ movie sound clips, On/Off switches for smoke and sound, RailSounds RC sound system with steam chuffing and engine background sounds, whistle, bell and user-activated announcements, Operating headlight, Puffing smoke unit, Operating coupler on rear of tender, Powerful maintenance-free motor, Two traction tires, Die-cast metal locomotive body, Large pilot and headlight lens shield
Passenger Car Features: Interior lighting, Decorated drumhead on observation car, Rounded observation platform.Silhouettes in windows
LionChief Remote Features: Forward and reverse speed control knob, Three buttons for whistle sound, bell and special announcements, Requires three AAA alkaline batteries (not included)
Minimum Curve: O31 | Set Length: 40" x 60" oval | Recommended Age: 10 years +

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars530 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
